html:
Vampire is a theorem prover for first order logic that is able to produce detailed proofs in a short time. However, debugging failed proof attempts can be quite cumbersome. SatVis attempts to change this by providing features such as derivation visualization, clause reformatting, common parent and/or consequence search, and many more.

Check out the official SatVis paper to find out more.
